attributes.action: Do NOT strip Wiley of his MBE over an opinion!!!
attributes.additional_details:
We live in a country where freedom of speech is still legally allowed. We are not living in a dictatorship. 

A man, woman, any human being should not have their entire career put on complete hold, stripped of any title, or black-balled/tarnished because of a matter of an opinion. 

Re-instate Wileys social media platforms, YouTube accounts, and let the man earn his money and continue his career!
attributes.background: Richard "Wiley" Cowie should NOT be stripped of his MBE and have his career tarnished over an opinion of his.

rejection.details: We cannot accept petitions about honours and appointments. Decisions about removing honours are made on the advice of the Forfeiture Committee and with the approval of the Sovereign: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/having-honours-taken-away-forfeiture
